overview: Moms and their daughters mix with other romance-minded daughter pairs when they join Mother-Daughter Exchange Club. These are their stories, featuring the sultry tigress, Persia Monir, Aiden Ashley, Nicole Moore, Darcy Tyler, Zoey Holloway, Jessi Palmer, Brenda James and Aubrey Belle. The passion and mannerisms are sincere, and trumps any situational lesbian scenarios that youâ€™ve watched before!
title: Mother-Daughter Exchange Club 19
